title: How to Play Moparscape

steps.headline: Double check and be sure you have the latest.
A window should pop up with a list of 'Scapes' made by MoparScapers.
steps.description: Find a server you like, click on the name, and write down the IP.

steps.headline: You used to be able to use http://client.silabsoft.org/client.php but it has disappeared.
Once it has loaded, go to Existing User and enter whatever username you want and a password.
Now, you can see the IP for the server where it says Server.

text: Double check and be sure you have the latest. Java installed. Go to http://www.moparscape.org/serverstatus.php  A window should pop up with a list of 'Scapes' made by MoparScapers. Find a server you like, click on the name, and write down the IP. You used to be able to use http://client.silabsoft.org/client.php but it has disappeared. You must now use www.moparscape.org Once it has loaded, go to Existing User and enter whatever username you want and a password.  Now, you can see the IP for the server where it says Server.
